title: Biden signs TikTok ban for government devices, setting up a chaotic 2023 for the app
description: Security concerns have inspired a wave of TikTok bans across the US over the last several weeks. It could be just the beginning.

title: You against the machine: Can you spot which image was created by A.I.?
description: AI art is suddenly everywhere. We created a quiz to see whether you can spot the difference between human- and robot-generated images.
